LAPM.PH¶

Module for phase-type distribution.

Functions

cum_dist_func(beta, A, Qt) Return the (symbolic) cumulative distribution function of phase-type.
density(beta, A, Qt) Return the (symbolic) probability density of the phase-type distribution.
expected_value(beta, A) Return the (symbolic) expected value of the phase-type distribution.
laplace(beta, A) Return the symbolic Laplacian of the phase-type distribtion.
nth_moment(beta, A, n) Return the (symbolic) nth moment of the phase-type distribution.
standard_deviation(beta, A) Return the (symbolic) standard deviation of the phase-type distribution.
variance(beta, A) Return the (symbolic) variance of the phase-type distribution.
z(A) Return the (symbolic) vector of rates toward absorbing state.
cum_dist_func(beta, A, Qt)[source]¶

Return the (symbolic) cumulative distribution function of phase-type.

Parameters:
  • beta (SymPy dx1-matrix) – initial distribution vector
  • A (SymPy dxd-matrix) – transition rate matrix
  • Qt (SymPy dxd-matrix) – Qt = \(e^{t\,\bf{A}}\)
Returns:

cumulative distribution function of PH(\(\bf{\beta}\), \(\bf{A}\))

\(F_T(t) = 1 - \bf{1}^T\,e^{t\,\bf{A}}\,\bf{\beta}\)
Return type:

SymPy expression
density(beta, A, Qt)[source]¶

Return the (symbolic) probability density of the phase-type distribution.

Parameters:
  • beta (SymPy dx1-matrix) – initial distribution vector
  • A (SymPy dxd-matrix) – transition rate matrix
  • Qt (SymPy dxd-matrix) – Qt = \(e^{t\,\bf{A}}\)
Returns:

probability density of PH(\(\bf{\beta}\), \(\bf{A}\))

\(f_T(t) = \bf{z}^T\,e^{t\,\bf{A}}\,\bf{\beta}\)
Return type:

SymPy expression

See also

z(): Return the (symbolic) vector of external output rates.

expected_value(beta, A)[source]¶

Return the (symbolic) expected value of the phase-type distribution.

Parameters:
  • beta (SymPy dx1-matrix) – initial distribution vector
  • A (SymPy dxd-matrix) – transition rate matrix
Returns:

expected value of PH(\(\bf{\beta}\), \(\bf{A}\))

\(\mathbb{E}[T] = -\bf{1}^T\,\bf{A}^{-1}\,\bf{\beta}\)
Return type:

SymPy expression
laplace(beta, A)[source]¶

Return the symbolic Laplacian of the phase-type distribtion.

Parameters:
  • beta (SymPy dx1-matrix) – initial distribution vector
  • A (SymPy dxd-matrix) – transition rate matrix
Returns:

Laplace transform of the probability density of PH(\(\bf{\beta}\), \(\bf{A}\))

\(L_T(s) = \bf{z}^T\,(s\,\bf{I}-\bf{A})^{-1}\,\bf{\beta}\)
Return type:

SymPy expression

See also

z(): Return the (symbolic) vector of external output rates.

nth_moment(beta, A, n)[source]¶

Return the (symbolic) nth moment of the phase-type distribution.

Parameters:
  • beta (SymPy dx1-matrix) – initial distribution vector
  • A (SymPy dxd-matrix) – transition rate matrix
  • n (positive int) – order of the moment
Returns:

nth moment of PH(\(\bf{\beta}\), \(\bf{A}\))

\(\mathbb{E}[T^n] = (-1)^n\,n!\,\bf{1}^T\,\bf{A}^{-1}\,\bf{\beta}\)
Return type:

SymPy expression
standard_deviation(beta, A)[source]¶

Return the (symbolic) standard deviation of the phase-type distribution.

Parameters:
  • beta (SymPy dx1-matrix) – initial distribution vector
  • A (SymPy dxd-matrix) – transition rate matrix
Returns:

standard deviation of PH(\(\bf{\beta}\), \(\bf{A}\))

\(\sigma(T) = \sqrt{\sigma^2(T)}\)
Return type:

SymPy expression

See also

variance(): Return the (symbolic) variance of the phase-type distribution.

variance(beta, A)[source]¶

Return the (symbolic) variance of the phase-type distribution.

Parameters:
  • beta (SymPy dx1-matrix) – initial distribution vector
  • A (SymPy dxd-matrix) – transition rate matrix
Returns:

variance of PH(\(\bf{\beta}\), \(\bf{A}\))

\(\sigma^2(T) = \mathbb{E}[T^2] - (\mathbb{E}[T])^2\)
Return type:

SymPy expression

See also

expected_value(): Return the (symbolic) expected value of the phase-type distribution.
nth_moment(): Return the (symbolic) nth moment of the phase-type distribution.
z(A)[source]¶

Return the (symbolic) vector of rates toward absorbing state.

Parameters:A (SymPy dxd-matrix) – compartment matrix
Returns:\(\bf{z} = -B^T\,\bf{1}\)
Return type:SymPy dx1-matrix
